name: Last Generation: Survival
description:
The game takes place in a post-apocalyptic world where robots have taken over the world. After the uprising of robots, due to the mistake of engineers, there were practically no people left. In this dangerous world, any day can be your last. You need to search and create various objects, defend against robots, tools and animals. Explore the terrain, resist enemies, build a shelter, and don't let thirst and hunger stop you from surviving!

GAME FEATURES:
• Open world
• Variety of NPCs
• Elements of world exploration
• Level system
• System of changing day and night
• Transport
• Various items of equipment
• Building
• A large number of items
• Craft
• Mining
• Construction system
